title: The Warring Dead
description: The zombie holocaust has come, and there is no place that is truly safe. Four intrepid survivors, Sasha, Terrance, Virgil, and the little girl, Max, have escaped their island stronghold, only to find themselves in the arms of what is left of the worlds military forces just when a showdown is imminent between the armies of undead and the combined might of the human race. From the mountains of Northern New York, to the shores of the Potomac, the battle is joined. Trapped in its net, the island survivors must learn more of their enemies, their alliesâ€¦ and the strange nature of one of their own."
author: David  Monette
